name: Sayonara Electric
description:
SUMMARY


This is an Interactive Adventure and Short Visual Novel Game depicting life on a lunar base.
All texts are performed by Japanese Voice Actors.

STORY


On a wall-mounted electronic calendar"important!" is flickering.
(what's my plan today?) I think vaguely.
The thinking like a Gaussian blur,I saw someone in sight.

"Good Morning, Breakfast is Ready."
"Morning, Rick… What's today…?"
"Today is Christmas Eve."

The date shown on the calendar is December 24.

VOICE ACTORS


Female protagonist : Mitsu
Male protagonist : Tisa
Rick : Hiyoko Asakura
